DOC.brief_summary: The investigators plan to recruit 40 healthy patients referred to the unit of Periodontology, diagnosed with generalized moderate - severe chronic periodontitis. treatment will include 4 - 6 sessions of scaling + root planning, oral hygiene instructions and motivation. Whole saliva will be collected at intake and 8 - 14 weeks post periodontal treatment. Saliva will be analyzed for trans locator protein. Study hypothesis: Periodontal treatment has an affect on saliva components.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Periodontal Treatment on Salivary Biomarkers
DOC.criteria: healthy patients moderate sever chronic periodontitis systemic disease pregnancy subjects under the age of 18
